reviewText: Subtitles could be better but really enjoyed the movie
Subtitles ok...but gackt sama so sexy

I love this series, however the English subtitles are horrible for the movie; i have been unable to even watch the whole movie they are so bad.  It appears to be a literal translation like they sat down on google translator so it is very hard to follow at times.  I hope someone comes out with a Fan sub soon as the movie looks awesome!  Three stars so far for the fact we can see it, will bump to 5 if the sub ever makes sense.
